content.description: The diagram below shows the age structure of a particular country.
content.question: Which of the following characteristics is most closely associated with a country that demonstrates the age structure in the diagram shown above?

choices.label: There is a low infant mortality rate.
A high percentage of the population has access to medical care.
There is a low population growth rate.
There is a high total fertility rate.

content.answer: There is a high total fertility rate.

skill.text: Skill 5.C: Explain patterns and trends in data to draw conclusions.
